name: Squaretopia
description:
Defend squaretopia with a randomly picked out weapon from the chief

game is dreamy because uh utopia in sky and sentient boxes and doritos so yeah

play in fullscreen :>

Controls -

w, a, s,  d , arrow keys  - movement

r - reload

click - shoot

don't mind the bad polish and bugs, this was my first c# project I made with out following a tutorial !
